column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Archana - Sorry to hear you didn't enjoy our Vegetable Soup Ramen. On Tuesday
column2: we will launch a new menu that includes our Spicy Creamy Vegan Ramen
column3: which is very different from the veggie ramen you tried. For future reference
column4: we do offer several vegetarian tapas options such as Brussels Sprouts Tempura
column5: Seaweed Salad and Crispy Kale Lollipops
column6: all of which are top sellers at JINYA.
